survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Water Leak Detection Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction levels with smart home water leak detection systems, focusing on ease of use, reliability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart home water leak detection system?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for smooth responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart home water leak detection system?

questions.question_text: Which features of your smart water leak detection system do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices
questions.client_notes: Multiple selection allowed. Ensure options are clear and concise.

script.question_text: Which features of your smart water leak detection system do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Integration with other smart home devices

questions.question_text: How easy was the installation process of your smart water leak detection system?
questions.client_notes: Assess ease of installation with a 5-point Likert scale.

script.question_text: How easy was the installation process of your smart water leak detection system?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any false alarms with your system?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge reliability.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any false alarms with your system?

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues you have encountered with your smart water leak detection system.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Encourage honest responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues you have encountered with your smart water leak detection system.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this smart water leak detection system to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.
